title: Fun Hands-On Activities
subtitle: With hundreds of activities to choose from, every day is a fresh day to get messy, get involved, and get active!
description: From slimy science experiments and brain-teasing challenges to fantasy adventures and crafty creations â€“ a little something for everyone! Kids will try new things, discover new passions, and get lots of time to develop their own interests. Join us on an expedition in search of what makes us smile and what makes us laugh. Scroll down below for a sneak peek at our camp activity themes!

title: New & Best Friendships
subtitle: Set sail on a Summer experience with best friends from the school year and meet new friends while making lasting memories.
description: Teamwork and bonding are at the root of what Summer Camp is all about. Making friends has never been easier, and your kiddo will have a boatload more to look forward to next school year!

title: Explore & Discover
subtitle: Together, we are heading on a journey of self-discovery and exploration!
